scripts.postbuild: mkdir -p dist && [ -f _redirects ] && cp -f _redirects dist/_redirects || true; [ -f _headers ] && cp -f _headers dist/_headers || true; [ -f ads.txt ] && cp -f ads.txt dist/ads.txt || true; [ -f robots.txt ] && cp -f robots.txt dist/robots.txt || true; [ -d deals ] && cp -R deals dist/deals || true
